name: Red Rock
description:
An homage to asteroids created within 72 hours for the Ludum Dare game jam #44.

Survive wave after wave of asteroids. In the brief respite in between, purchase upgrades for your ship. The twist? The only accepted currency is your ship's integrity.

You'll want to be able to survive as much damage as possible, so you should probably just hang on to... dayum, those homing missiles look cool, though!

Lovingly created by:

  • Andrew Neale (@NeverRestStudio)
  • James Dornan (@JamesDornanDev)
  • Callum Lory (@AmpersandGS)
  • Paul Sinclair
